metadata.title: CVE-2016-2562 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The checkHTTP function in libraries/Config.class.php in phpMyAdmin 4.5.xbefore 4.5.5.1 does not verify X.509 certificates from api.github.com SSLservers, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof these serversand obtain sensitive information via a crafted certificate.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
